The gameplay's core structure is really a match-3 puzzle, where the ball player must match the right color blocks to score points. The rule of match-3 is straightforward and popular; as long as the ball player matches over 3 blocks of the exact same color, they'll destroy, and the ball player can continue with each challenge's goal. If the ball player matches over 3 colored blocks, it will easily create block effects to destroy a large area. The overall game will even introduce other familiar elements of Harry Potters, like a simple Wingardium Leviosa spell to maneuver objects off the game board. The overall game has loads of content for players to relax and explore, even becoming a high-class witch along the way.
